segments.text: How do you like this waltz ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's very nice . I like it very much .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , then , may I invite you for the first dance ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: My pleasure . But I'm afraid I'm not much of a dancer , and I suppose you dance often .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Me ? Oh , no . In fact , I only took up dancing quite recently .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , really ? But you're doing the waltz wonderfully well .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm glad you say so . You dance beautifully too . It's lucky that I got you as a partner .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you for your compliments . It's just you are a good leader . Do you like the foxtrot and tango ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . And what dances do you like best ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Disco is my favorite . I like it better than any other dances because it can release one's hidden feelings , and is a healthy exercise . But I don't do the rock and roll nor break-dancing .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , well , the music has stopped . Thank you for the dance .
segments.speaker: S1
